name: Arcadance
description:
Play dance battles in a very stylish arcade!

P = Pause

Use your Arrow Keys to play

VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021 (7-11-2021, France)

The Jam theme was ARCADE, so I decided to make a game about one of the most legendary arcade games, the "Dancing Stage". Since the boom of arcade is in the 80s, I've chosen a pixel art style.
